text: Yours, Mine and Ours is a 1968 American family comedy movie directed by Melville Shavelson and was based on the 1965 novel Who Gets the Drumstick by Helen Beardsley. It stars Henry Fonda, Lucille Ball, Van Johnson, Walter Brooke, Louise Troy, Tom Bosley and was distributed by United Artists. It was remade in 2005. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Melville Shavelson
title: Yours, Mine and Ours (1968 movie)
